metadata.title: CVE-2014-1949 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
GTK+ 3.10.9 and earlier, as used in cinnamon-screensaver,gnome-screensaver, and other applications, allows physically proximateattackers to bypass the lock screen by pressing the menu button.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1949` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-gtk-3.0 - 3.10.8-0ubuntu1.4
gtk-3-examples - 3.10.8-0ubuntu1.4
libgail-3-0 - 3.10.8-0ubuntu1.4
libgtk-3-0 - 3.10.8-0ubuntu1.4
libgtk-3-bin - 3.10.8-0ubuntu1.4
libgtk-3-common - 3.10.8-0ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gtk+3.0 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.10.8-0ubuntu1.4').
